resources.string: The ancient Ying Yang Tajitu symbol rotating in the middle of a beautiful arctic landscape!
The Ying Yang Live Wallpaper has been installed on this device without a license!
Error while performing application license check, error code:
Go to the Android Market page of the application

The Ying Yang Live Wallpaper version installed on this device did not pass license validation! Please get a valid version of the application from the Android Market.
You may reattempt license validation right now by clicking the \'Check license\' button below, or later from the Preferences page. The license validation process needs access to the Android Market servers, so please make sure you have network coverage during the validation process.
Ying Yang Live Wallpaper license validation failed!
Click here to reattempt license validation
Unexpected error, please send a report...
Please click here to help fix the issue.
The Ying Yang Live Wallpaper has crashed
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click \'OK\'.
Thank you! We\'ll take care of this issue ASAP!
Crash reporting mechanism enabled, you will be able to contact dev via form submission
Contact the developer for issues, technical questions and/or suggestions

Your opinion matters to us! Feel free to send any issue, technical support question or any other suggestion you might have to the developer. Also, feel free to include your email address so we can get back to you.
This feature is only available in full version!

Key benefits of full version:
* 100% Ad Free
* No permissions required
* Fully skinnable
Your donation is what motivates us for developing these nice-looking wallpapers.\nIf you like it, please download the full version! You won\'t regret it!
